scenario_text.value:
There are definitely two sets of prints.
I can’t figure out which to follow.

(Minoru is confused as he looks at the
camera.)
(What should I say to him?)
Trust your instincts.
What’s the difference?

Both prints look the same...
We need to trust our instincts.
That’s it! Leave the instincts to me!
I’m always lucky at lotteries!
Oh, really?

No. I just wanted to say that.
I’m actually clueless.
This isn’t the time for fooling around...

One is a fake. There must be a difference.
We need to find it, no matter how small.

What are you saying? Do you see a difference,
Takuma?
I don’t know...
Right? How’re we supposed to choose?
Yeah, this is really hard.

Just choose one, Takuma! Whichever one you
pick is fine!
You can do it, Takuma!
Wow... that’s a lot of pressure.
Choose, Takuma!
